plot: There was your voice and the idea of a drawing. The result is raw, and somewhat clumsy. Maybe you feel this way too? Imprisoned by thoughts that your body is unable to translate.
title: Odélie
plot_es: There was your voice and the idea of a drawing. The result is raw, and somewhat clumsy. Maybe you feel this way too? Imprisoned by thoughts that your body is unable to translate.
